Articles.Content:
Hello, fellow rocketeers! I have a challenge here for you: build a usable boat, then put said boat into orbit around Kerbin. You can only place it on the launch vehicle laterally, or in it's direction of aquatic travel. Hard mode will be to land it on a body with an ocean (not Kerbin, but do it if you want), and sail it around there. There will be a seperate category for modded ships, so please include what mods, if any, you use. There will also be categories for normal and hard mode, and those who go to Laythe will get a 25 point bonus (sorry Eve). Please post pictures of your process, or a link to an imgur album. Score will be determined by a combination of maximum water speed and tonnage. I hope to see some great ships, happy building!

Normal Mode, No Mods

TBD

Normal Mode, Modded

TBD

Hard Mode, Modded

Actually never mind, all my boat designs are heavy and A-symmetric.

Heavy and A-symmetric means verry little. this craft was build more for looks than functionality in water, but, I still have it around

http://imgur.com/a/c7unE
May we see your attempt?

I'm afraid you'll have to take my word for this one. I have done this, at least easy mode, and I think that the upgrade to hard mode is purely academic. My laptop is out of action atm, and I'm doing this from mobile. It is possible, and I'll upload screenshots as soon as I can. Sorry
I'll need to see the orbital tonnage of the craft and the launch vehicle if I can consider this valid. Sorry.
